title: Define System Architecture
description: Develop a high-level design of the NeuralArchivingSystem, including hardware and software components.

title: Design Neural Pattern Encoding Algorithm
description: Research and develop an efficient method for encoding neural patterns into a storable format.

title: Develop Long-Term Storage Solution
description: Create a database or similar storage system capable of holding large amounts of neural pattern data.

title: Implement Retrieval Algorithm
description: Develop a method for retrieving stored neural patterns based on specific queries.

title: Create User Interface for Data Input and Retrieval
description: Develop an intuitive interface for users to input and retrieve data.

title: Write Technical Documentation
description: Create clear and concise documentation for the system architecture, algorithms, and API usage.

title: Perform Unit Tests for Core Components
description: Write and execute unit tests for the core components of the NeuralArchivingSystem.

title: Integration Testing of Components
description: Test the integration between various components of the NeuralArchivingSystem.

title: Security Audit and Vulnerability Assessment
description: Perform a thorough security audit to identify potential vulnerabilities in the NeuralArchivingSystem.
